name: Channelization / Ditching / Straightening
functionStatement: Long-term changes in channel size and slope maintain dynamic equilibrium and diverse habitats while interacting with the floodplain.
descriptionMarkdown: Screening metric used to evaluate Channel evolution based on the definition and bin thresholds provided for this metric.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field screening and/or Desktop (imagery/LiDAR)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Use available GIS layers/imagery and/or a field screening (as applicable) to quantify or rate the metric according to the provided bin thresholds.

inputs.label: Channelization / Ditching / Straightening
inputs.helpMarkdown: State/agency datasets, GIS/imagery, and field observations (as applicable).

levels.label: Good
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: Altered watercourse score - 71% or greater. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Fair
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Altered watercourse score between 41 and 70%. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Altered Watercourse Index Score of 40% or less. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.29)

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: State/agency datasets, GIS/imagery, and field observations (as applicable).

bin1.name: Poor
bin1.desc: Altered Watercourse Index Score of 40% or less.
